title: This Sans Serif font !
content:
I want the name of this font please !

Many Thanks,  
K.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [28197373~7a53309ee1a32f03fbafd95af04d8dca354e2981-original.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140327223835/http:/typophile.com/files/28197373~7a53309ee1a32f03fbafd95af04d8dca354e2981-original.jpg) | 107.15 KB |
author: kasir

comments.content: Can't find a perfect match. Actually, pretty convinced it's a custom job based on [Advent](http://web.archive.org/web/20140327223835/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Advent+Pro) by Andreas Kalpakidis. /d looks pretty spot on and the rest would be not so hard to redo starting from it. More alternatives: [Web Serveroff 4F](http://web.archive.org/web/20140327223835/http:/www.behance.net/gallery/Web-Serveroff/1239871), [Netto FF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140327223835/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/netto), [Arcle TNB](http://web.archive.org/web/20140327223835/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/arcle)
